Protocols/MapTileLoadDelegate.html#/s:FP.name: mapControllerDidCompleteLoading(_:)
Protocols/MapTileLoadDelegate.html#/s:FP.abstract: Informs the delegate the map has completed loading tile data and is displaying the map.

Protocols/MapMarkerSelectDelegate.html#/.name: mapController(_:didSelectMarker:atScreenPosition:)
Protocols/MapMarkerSelectDelegate.html#/.abstract: Informs the delegate a marker of the map was just selected

Protocols/MapLabelSelectDelegate.html#/s.name: mapController(_:didSelectLabel:atScreenPosition:)
Protocols/MapLabelSelectDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Informs the delegate a label of the map was just selected

Protocols/MapFeatureSelectDelegate.html#.name: mapController(_:didSelectFeature:atScreenPosition:)
Protocols/MapFeatureSelectDelegate.html#.abstract: Informs the delegate a feature of the map was just selected.

Protocols/MapShoveGestureDelegate.html#/.name: mapController(_:didShoveMap:)
Protocols/MapShoveGestureDelegate.html#/.abstract: Informs the delegate the map just shoved.

Protocols/MapRotateGestureDelegate.html#.name: mapController(_:didRotateMap:)
Protocols/MapRotateGestureDelegate.html#.abstract: Informs the delegate the map just rotated.

Protocols/MapPinchGestureDelegate.html#/.name: mapController(_:didPinchMap:)
Protocols/MapPinchGestureDelegate.html#/.abstract: Informs the delegate the map just zoomed via a pinch gesture.

Protocols/MapPanGestureDelegate.html#/s:.name: mapController(_:didPanMap:)
Protocols/MapPanGestureDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: Informs the delegate the map just panned.

Protocols/MapLongPressGestureDelegate.ht.name: mapController(_:recognizer:shouldRecognizeLongPressGesture:)
Protocols/MapLongPressGestureDelegate.ht.abstract: Asks the delegate if the map should recognize this long press gesture and perform default functionality (which is nothing, currently).

Protocols/MapLongPressGestureDelegate.ht.name: mapController(_:recognizer:didRecognizeLongPressGesture:)
Protocols/MapLongPressGestureDelegate.ht.abstract: Informs the delegate the map recognized a long press gesture.

Protocols/MapDoubleTapGestureDelegate.ht.name: mapController(_:recognizer:shouldRecognizeDoubleTapGesture:)
Protocols/MapDoubleTapGestureDelegate.ht.abstract: Asks the delegate if the map should recognize this double tap and perform default functionality (which is nothing, currently).

Protocols/MapDoubleTapGestureDelegate.ht.name: mapController(_:recognizer:didRecognizeDoubleTapGesture:)
Protocols/MapDoubleTapGestureDelegate.ht.abstract: Informs the delegate the map recognized a double tap gesture.

Protocols/MapSingleTapGestureDelegate.ht.name: mapController(_:recognizer:shouldRecognizeSingleTapGesture:)
Protocols/MapSingleTapGestureDelegate.ht.abstract: Asks the delegate if the map should recognize this single tap and perform default functionality (which is nothing, currently).

Protocols/MapSingleTapGestureDelegate.ht.name: mapController(_:recognizer:didRecognizeSingleTapGesture:)
Protocols/MapSingleTapGestureDelegate.ht.abstract: Informs the delegate the map recognized a single tap gesture.

Protocols/LocationManagerDelegate.html#/.name: authorizationDidSucceed()
Protocols/LocationManagerDelegate.html#/.abstract: The user authorized the application to receive location updates

Protocols/LocationManagerDelegate.html#/.name: authorizationDenied()
Protocols/LocationManagerDelegate.html#/.abstract: The user denied the application from receiving location updates.

Protocols/LocationManagerDelegate.html#/.name: authorizationRestricted()
Protocols/LocationManagerDelegate.html#/.abstract: The user is restricted from authorizing the application for location updates. This is normally due to parental control lockout.

Extensions/TGGeoPoint.html#/s:FE7ios_sdk.name: init(coordinate:)
Extensions/TGGeoPoint.html#/s:FE7ios_sdk.abstract: Creates a TGGeoPoint from a CoreLocation coordinate struct.

Extensions/TGGeoPoint.html#/s:FE7ios_sdk.name: init(coordinate:)
Extensions/TGGeoPoint.html#/s:FE7ios_sdk.abstract: Creates a TGGeoPoint from a On The Road Geopoint

Extensions/TGGeoPoint.html#/s:FE7ios_sdk.name: init(location:)
Extensions/TGGeoPoint.html#/s:FE7ios_sdk.abstract: Create a TGGeoPoint from a CoreLocation location object

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:vC7ios.name: cameraType
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:vC7ios.abstract: The camera type we want to use. Defaults to whatever is set in the style sheet.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:vC7ios.name: position
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:vC7ios.abstract: The current position of the map in longitude / latitude.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:vC7ios.name: rotation
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:vC7ios.abstract: The current rotation, in radians from north.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:vC7ios.name: shoveEnabled
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:vC7ios.abstract: Enables / Disables shove gestures on the map.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: init(coder:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Default required initializer for storyboard creation.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: init(nibName:bundle:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Default required initializer for nib-based creation.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:vC7ios.name: mapView
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:vC7ios.abstract: Direct access to the underlying TGMapViewController’s view.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:vC7ios.name: tabBarHeight
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:vC7ios.abstract: The height of our enclosing tab bar controller’s tab bar.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: animate(toPosition:withDuration:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Animates the map to a particular position using the default easing type (Cubic).

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: animate(toPosition:withDuration:with:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Animates the map to a particular position using the provided easing type.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: animate(toZoomLevel:withDuration:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Animates the map to a particular zoom level using the default easing type (Cubic).

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: animate(toZoomLevel:withDuration:with:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Animates the map to a particular zoom level using the provided easing type.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: animate(toRotation:withDuration:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Animates the map to rotate using the default easing type (Cubic).

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: animate(toRotation:withDuration:with:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Animates the map to rotate using the provided easing type.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: animate(toTilt:withDuration:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Animates the map to tilt using the default easing type (Cubic).

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: animate(toTilt:withDuration:with:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Animates the map to tile using the provided easing type.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: markerRemoveAll()
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Removes all existing markers on the map.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: markerAdd()
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Adds an individual marker to the map.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: markerSetStyling(_:styling:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Sets the styling of a particular marker.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: markerSetPoint(_:coordinates:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Sets the marker location on the map.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: markerSetPointEased(_:coordinates:duration:easeType:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Sets the marker location on the map in an animated fashion using the provided easing type

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: markerSetPolyline(_:polyline:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Sets the marker to represent a particular polyline.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: markerSetPolygon(_:polygon:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Sets the marker to represent a particular polygon.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: markerSetVisible(_:visible:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Sets the marker if it should be visible or not.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: markerSetImage(_:image:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Sets the marker bitmap image.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: markerRemove(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Removes an individual marker from the map.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: loadStyle(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Loads a map style synchronously on the main thread. Use the async methods instead of these in production apps.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: loadStyle(_:sceneUpdates:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Loads a map style synchronously on the main thread. Use the async methods instead of these in production apps.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: loadStyleAsync(_:onStyleLoaded:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Loads the map style asynchronously. Recommended for production apps. If you have scene updates to apply, either use the other version of this method that allows you to pass in scene updates during load, or wait until onSceneLoaded is called to apply those updates.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: loadStyleAsync(_:sceneUpdates:onStyleLoaded:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Loads the map style asynchronously. Recommended for production apps. If you have scene updates to apply, either pass in the scene updates at the initial call, or wait until onSceneLoaded is called to apply those updates.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: queueSceneUpdate(_:withValue:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Queue a scene update using a yaml string path. It’s recommended to use the other version of this that uses the TGSceneUpdate objects. Try to queue as many scene updates as you can in one pass as each applySceneUpdates() call can require a re-parse of the yaml and a re-render of the map. It is required to call applySceneUpdates() to activate the updated that have been enqueued.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: queue(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Queue an array of scene updates. Try to queue as many scene updates as you can in one pass as each applySceneUpdates() call can require a re-parse of the yaml and a re-render of the map. It is required to call applySceneUpdates() to activate the updated that have been enqueued.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: lngLat(toScreenPosition:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Convenience function that converts TGGeoPoints to UIKit screen coordinates.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: screenPosition(toLngLat:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Convenience function that converts UIKit screen coordinates to a lat/long pair.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: resetCameraOnCurrentLocation(_:zoomLevel:animationDuration:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Resets the camera on the current location, as well as the zoom and tilt.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: showFindMeButon(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Handles state for the find me button.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: showCurrentLocation(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Shows or hides the current location of the device. This starts the location request process and will prompt the user the first time its called.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: enableLocationLayer(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Enables / Disables the entire current location layer.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: add(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Adds an array of annotations to the map.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: remove(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Removes a single annotation

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: removeAnnotations()
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Removes all currents annotations.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: display(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Displays a routing result on the map. This currently only supports single start and endpoint routes. If there’s an existing route it will be silently replaced.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.name: removeRoute()
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:FC7ios.abstract: Removes the route from the map

Classes/MapzenRoutingController.html#/s:.name: controller()
Classes/MapzenRoutingController.html#/s:.abstract: Static function that vends a properly configured routing controller.

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:vC7ios_s.name: delegate
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:vC7ios_s.abstract: The delegate to receive the location authorization and status callbacks

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC7ios_s.name: requestAlwaysAuthorization()
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC7ios_s.abstract: Request the user give the application location access at all times.

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC7ios_s.name: requestWhenInUseAuthorization()
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC7ios_s.abstract: Request the user give the application location access only when in the foreground.

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC7ios_s.name: isInUseAuthorized()
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC7ios_s.abstract: Asks the location subsystem if we’re currently authorized for location access while in foreground.

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC7ios_s.name: isAlwaysAuthorized()
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC7ios_s.abstract: Asks the location subsystem if we’re currently authorized for location access at all times.

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC7ios_s.name: refreshCurrentLocation()
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC7ios_s.abstract: Refreshes the stored current location and also returns it to the caller

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC7ios_s.name: requestLocation()
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC7ios_s.abstract: The difference between this function and refreshCurrentLocation() is requestLocation() immediately returns and will serve the location via the delegate

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC7ios_s.name: startUpdatingLocation()
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC7ios_s.abstract: Starts the location manager callbacks for location updates

Classes/MapzenManager.html#/s:ZvC7ios_sd.name: sharedManager
Classes/MapzenManager.html#/s:ZvC7ios_sd.abstract: The single object to be used for all access

Classes/MapzenManager.html#/s:vC7ios_sdk.name: apiKey
Classes/MapzenManager.html#/s:vC7ios_sdk.abstract: The Mapzen API key. If this is not set, exceptions will get raised by the various objects in use.

Classes/MapzenManager.html.name: MapzenManager
Classes/MapzenManager.html.abstract: MapzenManager is a singleton object used for managing state between the various dependencies. Right now, it only manages the API key system.

Classes/LocationManager.html.name: LocationManager
Classes/LocationManager.html.abstract: The LocationManager class is a wrapper around iOS’s built in location subsystem. It provides a simpler interface and customization options.

Classes/PeliasMapkitAnnotation.html.name: PeliasMapkitAnnotation
Classes/PeliasMapkitAnnotation.html.abstract: PeliasMapkitAnnotation is a data object class that provides MapKit compatible annotation objects. It conforms to MKAnnotation protocol and is also used by the Mapzen iOS SDK for annotations (markers in Tangram-es).

Classes/MapzenRoutingController.html.name: MapzenRoutingController
Classes/MapzenRoutingController.html.abstract: MapzenRoutingController is a subclass of On The Road’s routing controller and is the main access point in the SDK for querying for routes.

Classes/MapViewController.html.name: MapViewController
Classes/MapViewController.html.abstract: MapViewController is the main class utilized for displaying Mapzen maps on iOS. It aims to provide the full set of features a developer would want for mapping-related tasks, such as displaying routes, results of a search, or the device’s current location (and any combination therein.)

Classes.html.abstract: The following classes are available globally.

Enums.html.abstract: The following enums are available globally.
